mainSequence.step: Actor SalesClerk specifies a new product.
Actor SpecifyNewProductUI asks user to provide information:
Category, Photo, Short description, Extended description, Technical description, Brand, Reference, Internal code, Price, Barcode, Height, Width, Weight, Shelf
SpecifyNewProductUI displays list of categories to SalesClerk.
SpecifyNewProductUI displays product information to SalesClerk.
